This TextView is placed into a LinearLayout which uses the TouchEffectAnimator class to perform this touch animation. This is the same class that is used on FlatButtons to achieve the same animation. You can look at the sample project to see the usage of this animator class and you can use it regardless of this FlatUI Library by just copying the TouchEffectAnimator class to your project.
